/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on Indian income, including
general information on Indian income
determining if Indian income is countable
income from gaming on Indian trust lands
conversion of assets theory – compensation for lost Indian land
business or investment income of Indian tribes
, and
exclusionary language in specific legislation – payment to Indian tribes
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section I - Counting Specific Types of Income
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section I
